channel.title: Alternate Account Applications
channel.description:
#### Alternate accounts are expected to follow the same [Global Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first) as well as [Forum Game Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-game-rules/78926) as all other players.
In order to have an alt account, you must fill out the following application and send it to a single Moderator - this Moderator will be specified once a game passes review, and can be found in the [Queue Thread](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-queue-queues-and-submit-thread/79675) under "Alt Mod." After completing your application, this Moderator will PM you (likely) within 1-3 days, either accepting or denying your request.
Please make sure the application has an appropriate title (ex. 'Alt Account Application'), as well as the following questions filled out completely.
> 1. What is your primary account's username? > > 2. What is the username you are requesting for your alt account? > > 3. What is your reason for requesting an alt? > 3. Do you understand that breaking the Global/Forum rules while on this account can lead to punishments on your main account, as well as a possible blacklist from creating alts?
### [color=#E74C3C ]Do not create an alt account without confirmation that your application was accepted.[/color] ---
### Hosting Information: Hosts may specify whether or not their game will allow alternate accounts and/or require alts to tell the host identity. If alts are not allowed, Moderators will regularly check and make sure that the playerlist contains none.
If a host does not specify whether or not alts are allowed, it is assumed that they are not.
---
That's it!
Please try to keep this thread related to the topic. If you have questions, feel free to ask below!
## [color=red]Beta Test Note[/color] [color=red]This may or may not work: If automod freaks out, the program may be dropped and alts wiped --[/color][í42-Xblade](https://forum.imperium42.com/u/%C3%AD42-xblade)

item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
it could devolve into that, theoretically, but i dont think it will.
all that it means is that the meta, no matter how obvious it might normally seem, ceases to be a consistent factor.
which is how alts are supposed to be

item.title: Alternate Account Applications
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
makes alts easier to hide too.
say person a is really bad at obscuring their meta. so even if they use an alt, everyone will know its them and it will be no benefit.
well, say they do that anyway. and its no benefit. at first.
but then, multiple other people get alts, and play into that person’s meta in order to get easy tr’s.
suddenly, its not so clear who’s under the alt, even when they’re under the distinct meta. thus the person in question can use an alt effectively

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Account Applications
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
I think that the option to have an alt account is a good thing, and if you don’t want to use an alt account, you do not have to.

If you don’t want to sign up for games that allow alt accounts, you do not have to.

We aren’t forcing anyone into it.

But rather than saying “alts bad” why not try to give us some constructive criticism and let us know how we can improve the system? What rule changes do you want to see implemented?

Getting feedback and hearing complaints after implementation and testing is what propelled us to change rules 21 and 22.

I can’t guarantee that all suggestions will be implemented, but I can guarantee that they will be heard.

Marshal:

alts being allowed to be re-used

We unfortunately can’t allow this. We can only allow temporary alts, not secondary accounts.
This isn’t up to us.

Read full topic
